abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, in an author's note, delivers earnest and at times folksy overview of her coming memoir Hard Choices; strategic release of this passage and another excerpt published in Vogue signals that memoir is geared away from politically contentious topics.
lead_paragraph: In an author’s note, Hillary Rodham Clinton avoided politically contentious topics and said her latest book was written for “Americans and people everywhere.”

headline.main: Clinton Signals New Memoir Will Be for a Wide Audience
headline.print_headline: Clinton Signals New Memoir Will Be for a Wide Audience

snippet: In an author’s note, Hillary Rodham Clinton avoided politically contentious topics and said her latest book was written for “Americans and people everywhere.”...
